description.value: The Ulgrem-Lurann bites down hard and unleashes an electrical discharge. It makes a jaws Strike. If the Strike hits, the target creature automatically becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} by the Ulgrem-Lurann and takes @Damage[1d4[electricity]] damage (@Damage[2d4[electricity]|shortLabel] for a mature Ulgrem-Lurann or @Damage[3d4[electricity]|shortLabel] for a specialized companion). The grabbed condition lasts until the end of your next turn, though the Ulgrem-Lurann can use @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{Grapple} to attempt to extend the duration as normal.
